attributes.action: We the undersigned believe that the GDC ORE Part 2 Examination booking system for the March/April 2012 examination was unfair.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the GDC ORE Part 2 Examination booking system for the March/April 2012 examination was unfair.

It should not be booked by a first come first served basis.

We ask the GDC to urgently review the system to allow a fairer system prior to the next examination.

If you agree the system was unfair (whether you were able to book a place or not) please sign below.
